      bBold - set to true to create a bold font.
      bItalic - set to true to create an italic font.

      public void SetNumberEditorInterval​(int newInterval)
      Sets the interval for this number editor. This is how much it increases/decreases with the mousewheel.
      Parameters:
      newInterval - the interval to adjust by. Defaults to 1. Valid values are 1 or greater .
      See Also:
